:: Vamprah ::

Vamprah saw the battle that was developing down, in alliance=
 base, if she did the idea tha she was thinking she would be in jaws. but t=
he reward would much more.

She flew towards the battle and shoot her guns =
against the enemies of the alliance, but she had bad luck and she suffered =
a shot, forcing it to land closest of alliance base.

--- Original Message =
----- 
  From: Yanshosh@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, =
October 13, 2000 11:16 AM
  Subject: Re: Aproaching the Alliance base...


=
  Congrats on the football game, KSL!

  If you want to join a battle, Airs=
hadow, DevilDuer can lead your new 
  bot to the one at the Alliance base.
=

  ::Zardus/Bloodystrike/DevilDuer/Havoc::

  Zardus growls, looking at the=
 attacking group. "Kill them," he 
  replies to Bloody Hammer.

  "We are u=
nder attack. Engage and kill all the invaders," he says to 
  Scattershot, =
Nemesis, Serpentor, and Unitron as he takes careful aim, 
  firing his plas=
ma launcher at Shockaract.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Bloodystrike flies in =
behind Shockaract's group, recieving Zardus' 
  orders. He takes out his ro=
cket launcher, firing it at Airbomber.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  DevilDuer =
stops in his tracks, his face breaking into a smile as he 
  recieves Zardu=
s' transmission. Battle was good, better than chasing 
  some bot.

  He ne=
arly crashes into the pod before he sees it, stopping a few 
  inches in fr=
ont of it (Airshadow's new char). He smiles, looking at 
  it and waiting f=
or it to scan a beast mode.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Havoc nods, checking =
his internal scanner as he looks at Chaos and 
  Minion.

  "Gunfire! There=
's a battle at the nearest base," he suddenly says, 
  his eyes lighting up=
 at the thought of battle, "Let's go."

  He transforms into his Ju 87 Stuk=
a (German WW2 jet, the one with the 
  sirens), flying off toward the Allia=
nce base. Repressor, transforming 
  into an attack chopper, follows after =
him.



  --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
  > Bu=
rning Hammer ran outside and looked off and seen Shokaract's team.
  > 
  >=
 "Looks like they are just standing there, not doing anything, maybe 
  the=
y are
  > peaceful? I hope not." Burning Hammer says. Airbomber and Time Wa=
rp 
  slowly
  > walk up to the Alliance base, and come right up to Burning=
 Hammer.
  > 
  > "I await orders good old fearless leader." Burning Hammer=
 says 
  through
  > commlink to Zardus. Time Warp started to say something=
 and then 
  fired a bolt
  > into Burning Hammer's head. Burning Hammer fa=
lls and lays there. 
  Time Warp
  > aims at the base, but is knocked over.=
 Burning Hammer is up and 
  punching
  > away at him. Airbomber points his=
 gun at the back of Burning 
  Hammer's head.
  > Burning Hammer swings his=
 hand and knocks it across the landscape. 
  Hefires a
  > fireball into Ai=
rbomber and blasts him backwards. Burning hammer 
  beats on
  > Time Warp =
until he's bloody, and then stands up.
  > 
  > "Still awaiting orders, wha=
t should I do with these here 2?" 
  Burning Hammer
  > asks Zardus...


  =
      eGroups Sponsor
